body_html:
I meet the same issue. and I've reported it to Tensorflow team.

As @mtngle commented in #16513 , there are three solutions:

The prebuilt tensorflow binaries support CUDA 9.0 - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.5.0

You have 3 options:

Compile from source and link against CUDA 8.0.
Upgrade your CUDA to 9.0
Continue to user TF 1.4.

waiting for response.

body:
I meet the same issue. and I've reported it to Tensorflow team.

As @mtngle commented in #16513 , there are three solutions:

> The prebuilt tensorflow binaries support CUDA 9.0 - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.5.0
> 
> You have 3 options:
> 
> Compile from source and link against CUDA 8.0.
> Upgrade your CUDA to 9.0
> Continue to user TF 1.4.

waiting for response.
